LanguageData.SRV_Bellows.label: bellows
LanguageData.SRV_Bellows.description: Increases forging speed. Needs to be placed adjacent to a forge or a crucible forge. One forge can be linked to only one bellows.
LanguageData.SRV_ShelterHeater.label: shelter heater
LanguageData.SRV_ShelterHeater.description: Burning logs used to produce heat. Burns out after two days. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.SRV_Snare.label: snare trap
LanguageData.SRV_Snare.description: A simple snare for catching animals. Large animals will be temporarily caught by the trap, while small animals will be caught and suffocate.
